### matchCombineConcatVectors() {#a84bf6a20255406e9c9f6a52f5c4c7b34}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CombinerHelper::matchCombineConcatVectors (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &amp; Ops) const</>}>
If <code>MI</code> is G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS, try to combine it.

Returns true if MI changed. Right now, we support:
<ul>
<li>concat&#95;vector(undef, undef) =&gt; undef</li>
<li>concat&#95;vector(build&#95;vector(A, B), build&#95;vector(C, D)) =&gt;</li>
</ul>


<Link id="details" />



<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS <code>MI</code> is undef or if it can be flattened into a build&#95;vector. In the first case <code>Ops</code> will be empty In the second case <code>Ops</code> will contain the operands needed to produce the flattened build&#95;vector.




<SectionUser title="Precondition">
MI.getOpcode() == G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS.
</SectionUser>

### tryCombineMemCpyFamily() {#ae1fd41e303fcb42122f8a0432efcd87d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CombinerHelper::tryCombineMemCpyFamily (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, unsigned MaxLen=0) const</>}>
Optimize memcpy intrinsics et al, e.g.

constant len calls. /p MaxLen if non-zero specifies the max length of a mem libcall to inline.

For example (pre-indexed): 

<CodeBlock>
$addr = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD $base, $offset
&#91;...&#93;
$val = G&#95;LOAD $addr
&#91;...&#93;
$whatever = COPY $addr
</CodeBlock>

--&gt; 

<CodeBlock>
$val, $addr = G&#95;INDEXED&#95;LOAD $base, $offset, 1 (IsPre)
&#91;...&#93;
$whatever = COPY $addr
</CodeBlock>

or (post-indexed): 

<CodeBlock>
G&#95;STORE $val, $base
&#91;...&#93;
$addr = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD $base, $offset
&#91;...&#93;
$whatever = COPY $addr
</CodeBlock>

--&gt; 

<CodeBlock>
$addr = G&#95;INDEXED&#95;STORE $val, $base, $offset
&#91;...&#93;
$whatever = COPY $addr 
</CodeBlock>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-h/#l00316">316</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-h">CombinerHelper.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-cpp/#l01660">1660</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-cpp">CombinerHelper.cpp</a>.

### findPostIndexCandidate() {#a2700f65ebe47d115d7df1b1fd68addd7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CombinerHelper::findPostIndexCandidate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gloadstore">GLoadStore</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; Addr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; Base, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; Offset, bool &amp; RematOffset) const</>}>
Given a non-indexed load or store instruction <code>MI</code>, find an offset that can be usefully and legally folded into it as a post-indexing operation.
